children.description: Manage database encryption.

children.description: Decrypt a previously encrypted database.

children.description: Delete all encrypted data from the database. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE OPERATION.

children.description: Rotate database encryption keys.

children.description: Run the built-in PostgreSQL deployment.

children.description: Output the connection URL for the built-in PostgreSQL deployment.

children.description: Show disk usage, in gigabytes.

children.description: Show memory usage, in gigabytes.

children.description: Get started with a templated template.

children.description: List all the templates available for the organization

children.description: Download the active, latest, or specified version of a template to a path.

children.description: Manage different versions of the specified template

children.description: Archive a template version(s).

children.description: List all the versions of the specified template

children.description: Will update and start a given workspace if it is out of date

children.title: users
children.description: Manage users

children.description: Update a user's status to 'active'. Active users can fully interact with the platform

children.title: users delete
children.description: Delete a user by username or user_id.

children.description: Show a single user. Use 'me' to indicate the currently authenticated user.

children.title: users suspend
children.description: Update a user's status to 'suspended'. A suspended user cannot log into the platform

children.description: Show coder version
